title: Prepare Field After a Concert
description: A stadium hosted a concert, and the grounds crew needs to prepare the grass field for a soccer game in two days.

tasks.description: Assess the condition of the field after the concert flooring has been removed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the condition of the turf, noting areas of compaction.

tasks.description: Generate a turf recovery plan, including aeration, watering, and mowing schedules.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed, hour-by-hour plan for the grounds crew.

tasks.description: Schedule the necessary grounds crew staff and equipment for the recovery work.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules all required resources.
